src_original: དེ་ལ་དམར་སེར་གྱི་སྡེབ་སྦྱོར་རྩ་བའི་མདོ་དང་དེའི་དཔེར་བརྗོད་ནི་རྒྱལ་བའི་ལྷས་མཛད་དོ་༎ དེ་དག་གིས་མཛད་དུ་ཟིན་ཀྱང་དེ་ཡོན་བརྒྱད་རྣམས་ཀྱིས་ཤིན་ཏུ་དབེན་པར་གྱུར་ཏེ་། དེ་ལྟར་ནི་དེ་ལ་པརའསཏའ་ར་ལ་སོགས་པ་རྣམས་ལ་མདོར་བསྡུ་བ་མེད་པ་དང་། ལྕི་ཡང་གི་མིང་ལ་སོགས་པ་རྣམས་ལ་ཚིགས་སུ་བཅད་པས་མ་བཅིངས་པ་དང་། ཕལ་ཆེར་མི་གསལ་བ་ཉིད་དང་། ངོ་མཚར་བའི་སྦྱོར་བ་བསྟན་པ་ཡང་མ་མཛད་པ་དང་། ངལ་བསོ་དང་། ལུས་དང་། མིང་གི་མིང་འདྲེས་པ་དང་སླ་བ་ཡང་མེད་དོ་༎ དཔེར་ན་། ར་ཛ་དག་རྨ་བྱའི་འགྲོས་སོ་༎

tgt_original: taiḥ kṛtamapi tadaṣṭaguṇaviviktam |  tadyathā- tatra prastārādiṣua na saṃkṣepaḥ,

spaṣṭaṃ padyaṃ ca saṃkṣiptaṃ sūtreṇa samudāhṛtam |  asaṃsṛṣṭaṃ kramaḥ pāṭhyaṃ gaṇa eva yatirguṇāḥ ||2 ||  padyaṃ catuṣpadī tacca vṛttajātiprabhedato dvividham |  akṣarasaṃkhyaṃ vṛttaṃ mātrāsamkhyā bhavati jātiḥ ||2 ||
yā caturbhiḥ pādaiḥ sahitā sā catuṣpado |
jināya munisūryāya pāaramajyotirātmane |  antārniśi vimitrāṇāmantardinakṛte namaḥ ||1 ||  chandoratnākaravṛttiḥ
' tacca vṛttajātiprabhedato dvividham',  evaṃ vṛttajātibhedena ' tat' padyam dvividham |
namo vāgīśvarāya mañjuśrīkumārabhūtāya |  antarniśivimitrāṇāmantardinakṛtaṃ munim |  paramajyotirātmanaṃ jinasūryaṃ manāmi ca ||1 ||
svakāvyaṃ parakāvyaṃ ca yathākṛtam ( iti )  viśeṣeṇa avabodhayituṃ śāstraṃ praṇīyate |
yathā- aṣṭau dīrghā likhyante tathānte'ṣṭau plutāśca |  navamo lṛkāra ekaḥ |  na tridhā vibhaktaḥ |
ataḥ svarā dvāviśatiḥ |  yadakṣaraṃ ekaikaśaḥ ( svataḥ )

src_original: ཀ་ལ་སོགས་པ་ནས་ཧའི་མཐར་ཐུག་པ་སུམ་ཅུ་རྩ་གསུམ་དང་། རྗེས་སུ་ང་རོ་དང་། རྣམ་པར་གཅད་བྱ་དང་། ལྕེ་རྩ་ཅན་དང་། མཆུ་ཅན་ཏེ་བཞི་རྣམས་དང་སུམ་ཅུ་རྩ་བདུན་ནོ་༎ དེ་ལྟ་བས་ན་བསྟན་བཅོས་འདིར་ཡི་གེ་རྣམས་ནི་ལྔ་བཅུ་རྩ་དགུའོ་༎ ཡི་གེ་བགྲང་བ་ན་དབྱངས་བགྲང་བར་བྱའི་། གསལ་བྱེད་རྣམས་ནི་མ་ཡིན་ནོ་༎ ཡང་འདིར་ཚིགས་སུ་བཅད་པར་གྱུར་ན་།

tgt_original: yadakṣaraṃ ekaimapi ( svataḥ )  sphuṭaṃ paṭhyate tatta svara iti |
sa ca aṣṭavidhaḥ ā ī ū ṝ lṝ e ai o au iti |
vyañjanāt pūrvaḥ yo sa hrasvo'pi gururgakāro vakraścāpi bhavati |

bhādiguru trikamiṣṭa jantaguru santaguru māśeṣaguru |  yādilaghu ca rantarlaghu tantalaghu nāśeṣalaghu ||4 ||  bhādiguru trikamiṣṭam |  trikaṃ tu akṣaratrayam |  triṣu ya ādiguruḥ sa bhatvena iṣyata iti bhasaṃjñā iṣṭā( ' || ) |
ādiścāsau guruścāpi bhavatīti ādiguruḥ |  ādireva gururiti |  evaṃ pareṣvapi avagantavyam |  jantarguruḥ |
' dīrghaplutau caiva'- dīrghaplutau tu sarvatra guruvakrau |

samamardhasamaṃ viṣamaṃ ceti trividhaṃ pracakṣate vṛttam |  tanumadhyādikamupacitrakādivaktrādi tat kramaśaḥ ||7 ||  samam ardhasamam viṣamañceti trividhaṃ vṛttam uktam |  tānyapi yathākramaṃ tanumadhyādi upacitrādi vaktrādi ca |  sthānaṃ yāririṣṭairante caraṇānām |
loko'pi gaṇavaiṣamyavibhāgaṃ vihāya sāmyavibhāge tiṣṭhati |  yatim abhyaset |
' tyau cedi' ti śarīram |  padānteṣu yatiḥ,  tatpādaiḥ pratipādamiti abhisaṃbadhyate |  'tanumadhyā' iti saṃjñā |  jaḥ saḥ gakāraśca yadi pratipādaṃ syuḥ,
takārayakārau yadi pratipādaṃ syātāma tadā tanumadhyākhyaṃ vṛttaṃ syāt |
tasmāt sūtrākṣaraireva prastāraḥ kāryaḥ |  ( yathā- tyau cettanumadhyā)
mo vā rau vā śālinī vedalokaiḥ20 ||
yadi pratipādaṃ makāraḥ vasaṃyuktaḥ dvau rephau api vasaṃyuktau tathā vedairlokaiśca yatiḥ,
tadā śālinī syāt |  mo vā nau vā bhramaravilasitā ||22 ||  yadi pratipādaṃ mo vasahitaḥ,
yadi pratipādaṃ rātpare naḥ raḥ laḥ gaśca syuḥ tadā rathoddhatā |  rātpare narala gāratho ddhatā ||
upari indravajrā adhaḥ upendravajrā madhye ca caturdaśopajātayaḥ |
yadi pratipādaṃ bhatritayāt pare gau staḥ,
gurunidhanamubhayamapi vihitalalitapadavisṛti yadi bhavati bhavati śikhā ||12 ||
daśadaśavasulaghu ca yadi viṣamamitaradapi ca daśadaśadaśalaghukaṃ |
yadi ( viṣama)  pādayoḥ aṣṭāviṃśati laghukaṃ ca yugmapādayoḥ yadi laghukaṃ triṃśat ca bhavanti,  yadi cobhayorantaguruḥ lalitapadavisṛtiḥ syāt,
samaviṣamābhyāṃ ākhyātaṃ sthānaṃ niyataṃ yat tanniyama- rahitam |  vinivartya yatra ardhaviracanā iyaṃ iha jagati nigaḍitā bhavati |
tathā yasya saṃjñā sadṛśābhidhānā tad itthaṃ nigaḍanam ityarthaḥ |
yukpādayorjakāreṇa vaktraṃ pathyeti kīrtitam ||2 ||  vaktraṃ pathyeti abhidhīyate,
pathyā sā viparītādirbhaved viparītapathyā ityarthaḥ |  iha vaktraṃ viparītapathyā ityudāhṛtam |
ayukpādayoḥ ambudhe paraṃ jakāreṇa |  vaktraṃ tadeva capalā nakāreṇāyujorjñeyā ||4 ||
bhenāmbudhestadvipulā ||7 ||  vaktre ambudheḥ paraṃ bhe sati tadvipulā ityarthaḥ |
vaktre sarvatra ambudheḥ paraṃ rakāreṇa tato'nyaṃ syāt |
vaktre sarvatra ambudhe paraṃ nakāreṇāpi sā vipulā nakāra-vipulā ( navipulā ) |
vaktre sarvatra ambudheḥ paraṃ takāreṇāpi sā vipulā takāra-vipulā ( tavipulā) |
vaktre sarvatra ambudheḥ paraṃ makāreṇāpi sā vipulā makāravipulā dṛṣṭā |
anyadato hi vitānam ||12 ||  yadudāhṛtalakṣaṇād anyad vaktralakṣaṇaṃ,
aṣṭakṣareṣu pādeṣu nādyāt snau yo'mbudhervaktram ||1 ||  ādyamantaṃ ca parityajya dvigaṇamadhyākhya-vaktrabhedaprastāraḥ |
evaṃ sarvapādeṣu ādyakṣarāt paraṃ snau na staḥ,
tatrāpi ādyakṣarāt pare snābhāve sati caturbhyaḥ paraṃ ' yaḥ' syāt tadā vaktram |
tatpare pādāḥ kramaśaḥ caturbhivardhitāḥ,  tadetad nānā vinyāsena saṃśobhi salalitapadapadavīkaṃ tu taccaturūrdhvamiti viṣamameva vṛttam budhāḥ prāhuḥ |
asya pādā api jātivṛttyoḥ aṅgagaṇād veditavyāḥ |
tadyathā sūtra eva prathamaḥ padavaktrapādavat dvitīyaśca āryāyāḥ dvitīyapādavat,  tṛtīyacaturthau āryāyāḥ dvitīyārdhavat |
gaganidhananikhilalaghupādaḥ |  yadi mudamupanayati jagati yuta āṅā  samupahitasalalitayatigatiratha bhavati pīḍaḥ ||15 ||
daśadaśavasulaghu ca yadi viṣamamitaradapi ca daśadaśadaśalaghukaṃ |
gurunidhanamubhayamapi vihitalalitapadavisṛti yadi bhavati bhavati śikhā ||12 ||
yadi ( viṣama)  pādayoḥ aṣṭāviṃśati laghukaṃ ca yugmapādayoḥ yadi laghukaṃ triṃśat ca bhavanti,  yadi cobhayorantaguruḥ lalitapadavisṛtiḥ syāt,
samaviṣamābhyāṃ ākhyātaṃ sthānaṃ niyataṃ yat tanniyama- rahitam |
vinivartya yatra ardhaviracanā iyaṃ iha jagati nigaḍitā bhavati |
tatrāpi ādyakṣarāt pare snābhāve sati caturbhyaḥ paraṃ ' yaḥ' syāt tadā vaktram |
iha āpīḍa eva yadi praṭhamaḥ pādaḥ dvittīyaṃ pādam atikramya punaḥ paraṃ vasatimapi nātikrāmati,
jenāyujorudāhṛtā viparītādireṣāsminna ||3 ||  pathyā sā viparītādirbhaved viparītapathyā ityarthaḥ |  iha vaktraṃ viparītapathyā ityudāhṛtam |
yukpādayorjakāreṇa vaktraṃ pathyeti kīrtitam ||2 ||  vaktraṃ pathyeti abhidhīyate,
yat yat prāptaṃ tat tadeva pratyekaṃ pratitiryak likhet |
tathodbhūtaṃ phalati naṣṭam || ' ' |  naṣṭaṃ tu nayanam |
yadā vṛttaṃ svarūpeṇa katitham iti jñāne sati kīdṛśaṃ na jñāyate tajjñāanārtham uddiṣṭividhiḥ |
yathā- caturakṣarachandasi gurudvaye madhye sati vṛttaṃ katitham iti pṛṣṭe sati,
tatra ādau eva adhaḥ ekaṃ nyasya tadupari krameṇā uttiṣṭhet,  svasvādhastāt samamuparyupari ca akṣaraṃ samasaṃkhyayā pravarteta |
kati ekalaghūni,  dvilaghūni ityādi yadā jñātuṃ icchet tadā laghukriyā |  rūpamiti ekārthaḥ,
anena pratyekaṃ pañca syuḥ tatra ekotthānaṃ catussthānaṃ ca |
tasmāt aguru- eka gurvādi vṛttamapi draṣṭavyam |
tataḥ tādirūpam utkṣipya upanyasya tatsthāne chandasaḥ akṣarasaṃkhyāṃ likhet |
yathā- ekākṣarachandasi dvayakṣarachandasi tadeva ādirūpam utkṣipya tatsthāne saṃkhyāṃ likhet tryakṣare tathaiva saṃkhyāṃ likhitvā tatto'dhaḥ sthitaḥ dvayam svādhaḥ samamekena miśrayet |
caturakṣare tathaiva saṃkhyāṃ likhet,  tato'dhaḥ sthitatrayaṃ svasvādharasamatritayaikena miśrayet |
anena vṛttani ṣoḍaśadhā syuḥ |  iti vṛttasaṃkhyā |
atra varṇaśabdena vyañjaneṣu aniyatāḥ svarāḥ akṣarāṇi ucyante |
yathā- caturakṣarachandasi vṛttasya ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyā iti idameva ādau likhitā caturakṣaraiḥ guṇitavyam |  tataḥ paraṃ tadarddhaṃ tato'pi ca pare ubhayapiṇḍaḥ |
tatra laghūnām upari yadaṅko'sti tam laghoḥ upari tatpiṇḍe saikaṃ kuryāt |
evaṃ karaṇena yā saṃkhyā labdhā sā etāvatā iti uddiṣṭaṃ veditavyam |
te piṇḍena nava,  saikena ca daśa |
anena tad vṛttaṃ daśamiti jñānaṃ syāt |
tāni ṣoḍaśa vṛttāni dviguṇitāni ekonaikatriśat syuḥ |
evam yato na pratyayo viśeṣālpena pratīyate,  śāstrakārāṇāmapi atiśayajñānaṃ samyak pratīyate,
vṛtteṣu pratijātiṣu vā guruladhvakṣaramātrāṇāṃ saṃkhyājñānam abhidhīyate |
varṇāḥ 40 guravaḥ kati santi iti puṣṭe sati,
ādāvante ca ghaṭitavyāḥ |  madhye nyasya dalitavyāḥ |
guravaḥ 17 ādau gurūn dviguṇīkṛtya mātrā ghaṭyet,  madhye varṇān dviguṇīkṛtya mātrayā ghaṭyet,
laghavo dviguguruyutā dviguṇā varṇā vivarjitā laghubhiḥ |
gurumiśritāśca varṇā yathaiva tāvatya iha mātrāḥ || 14 ||  laghavaḥ 23, varṇāḥ 40, varṇāḥ 40  guravaḥ 17, laghavaḥ 23,
guravaḥ 17 ādau gurūn dviguṇīkṛtya nyastavyāḥ,  madhye varṇāḥ dviguṇitavyāḥ,
tasmāt yavo'ṅgulyādi ekatriṃśadadho'dhvā |  evaṃ gurubhūmiḥ yāvatī tāvatī laghubhūmiḥ kalpanīyā |
laghavaḥ ghaṭitavyāḥ,  ante miśritavyāḥ |  anena saptapañcāśanmātrāḥ syuḥ |
tatparamārtheḥ paramaṃ jagato vidyāṃ prasādayantu || 15 ||  (iti ratnākaraśāntikṛte chandoratnākare ṣaṣṭho'dhyāyaḥ |)  śubhamastu sarvajagatām |
te piṇḍena nava,  saikena ca daśa |
anena tad vṛttaṃ daśamiti jñānaṃ syāt |

yathā- ekākṣarachandasi dvayakṣarachandasi tadeva ādirūpam utkṣipya tatsthāne saṃkhyāṃ likhet tryakṣare tathaiva saṃkhyāṃ likhitvā tatto'dhaḥ sthitaḥ dvayam svādhaḥ samamekena miśrayet |
tataḥ tādirūpam utkṣipya upanyasya tatsthāne chandasaḥ akṣarasaṃkhyāṃ likhet |

dvilaghūni ityādi yadā jñātuṃ icchet tadā laghukriyā |
|paiṅgalī laghukriyā ||  atra chandasi kati vṛttani alaghūni,  kati ekalaghūni,
atra varṇaśabdena vyañjaneṣu aniyatāḥ svarāḥ akṣarāṇi ucyante |
tasmāt aguru- eka gurvādi vṛttamapi draṣṭavyam |

akṣarāṇi 64 gurulaghavaḥ 32 mātrāḥ 96 tatra ādau akṣarāṇi catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ |  madhye gururapi laghuśca bhavataḥ dvātriṃśat |
tasmāt yavo'ṅgulyādi ekatriṃśadadho'dhvā |  evaṃ gurubhūmiḥ yāvatī tāvatī laghubhūmiḥ kalpanīyā |
vṛtteṣu pratijātiṣu vā guruladhvakṣaramātrāṇāṃ saṃkhyājñānam abhidhīyate |
yaḥ paramaḥ paramārtho yadakhilaparamārthagatiphalavarttmani |  saṃkhyādvayaṃ darśayitvā yathāyogyaṃ anyeṣāṃ sphūṭībhūtatvāt mā te ca agha upari ca nyāsakarmānte draṣṭavyāḥ |
